value.name: Pensacola police chief candidate forum is Wednesday. Here's how you can watch
value.description: The new chief search is taking place not long after the Citizens Police Advisory Committee — a group formed after the 2019 fatal shooting of Tymar Crawford by a former Pensacola officer ...

value.name: All Pensacola police chief candidates support permanent citizens police advisory committee
value.description: All three candidates for the Pensacola Police Chief job said they support having some type of citizens police advisory committee. The three candidates spoke at a virtual police chief forum ...
